about_the_game:
Space Dance is an exhilarating space simulator that takes players back to the golden era of classic fixed shooter games from the 90s. In this action-packed adventure, you assume the role of a skilled space pilot, entrusted with the critical mission of defending Earth from a relentless onslaught of alien invaders seeking to enslave humanity.


Key Features

  • Nostalgic 90s Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a retro-inspired space adventure that pays homage to classic fixed shooter games from the 90s, featuring pixel-art graphics and a vibrant chiptune soundtrack.
  • Varied Weaponry: Choose from three distinct weapon types, including laser cannons, rapid-fire blasters, and homing missiles, allowing you to customize your playstyle and approach each battle uniquely.
  • Challenging Levels and Boss Battles: Take on 15 handcrafted levels filled with intense space battles and face formidable boss encounters, each with their own attack patterns and weaknesses, providing a rewarding challenge.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Experience unpredictable gameplay with random events, such as asteroid showers, ion storms, and enemy reinforcements, keeping you on your toes and adding an element of surprise.
  • Competitive Leaderboard: Compete with players worldwide for the highest scores and bragging rights on the online leaderboard, showcasing your piloting skills and accomplishments in Space Dance.

name: SPACE DANCE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel quad-core 2.0 GHz or dual-core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 5700
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or i7
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or amd Radeon HD 8000 series
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: Space Dance is a 90s-inspired space simulator where you defend Earth from alien invaders. Choose from three weapon types, face challenging battles, and upgrade your ship to compete for the highest score. Get ready for an intense space adventure!
